特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Face to Face class:
This course is mainly centered on a seminar style. Students will primarily do pair work and group work as well as be asked to give short presentations.
(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Assignments will be submitted through Google Classroom (information posted later if needed), Simultaneous Zoom classes from 1st session through two-way broadcast.
This course is primarily designed for students who have TOEFL/TOEIC scores lower than the minimum required for registration into IE, but students who meet that requirement can still register for Basic if they desire low-level English practice. This course also functions to introduce students to LC courses and the personal benefits associated with studying abroad. The course is four-skills and meets once a week. Students will participate in pair work, group work, discussions and task based projects to assist them to develop both their English and classroom study skills.
(Correspondence during the priority period for infection prevention)
Sessions 2 and onwards will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast and on demand through Google Classroom. All instructions and Zoom link provided on Google Classroom. See attachment 1 for registration instructions.
